alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Hubbard, northern Wadena, northern Otter Tail and southern Becker Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Oshawa to near Dunvilla. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Park Rapids, Perham, Pelican Rapids, Frazee, Menahga and Lake Lida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail
